vis.name: Average Response Time
vis.description: The average response time of threads addressed every day.

vis.name: Average Response Time per Thread
vis.description: The average response time of threads addressed every day, in relation to the number of threads considered.

vis.name: Average Response Time (Cumulative)
vis.description: The average response time of threads addressed up to and including the current date.

vis.name: Average Response Time per Thread (Cumulative)
vis.description: The average response time of threads addressed up to and including the current date, in relation to the number of threads considered.
